results.title: Hyaluronic acid-coated polymeric micelles with hydrogen peroxide scavenging to encapsulate statins for alleviating atherosclerosis
results.text_hl: In conclusion, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@-loaded micelle system provides a promising and innovative option against @<m>DISEASE_Atherosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@.

results.title: Compound Danshen Dripping Pill inhibits hypercholesterolemia/atherosclerosis-induced heart failure in ApoE and LDLR dual deficient mice via multiple mechanisms
results.text_hl: Taken together, our study suggests that CDDP or CDDP plus a low dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can be an effective therapy to reduce @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@/@<m>DISEASE_Atherosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@-induced @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@.

results.title: In the wake of the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study trial.
results.text_hl: PURPOSE OF REVIEW: In 1994, the 4S trial was revolutionary by showing that @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ lowering with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduced, not only @<m>DISEASE_Atherosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerotic vascular disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Atherosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@ASCVD@@@) events, but also all-cause mortality as compared to placebo.

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits POVPC-mediated induction of endothelial-to-mesenchymal cell transition
results.text_hl: Our findings reveal a novel mechanism of @<m>DISEASE_Atherosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ that can be inhibited by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: pH-Responsive hyaluronic acid-enveloped ZIF-8 nanoparticles for anti-atherosclerosis therapy.
results.text_hl: Herein, we employed a one-step self-assembly approach for effectively encapsulating the anti-AS drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) in zeolitic imidazolate framework-8 (ZIF-8) (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@/ZIF-8), and then coated it with @CHEMICAL_Hyaluronic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006820 @@@hyaluronic acid@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Hyaluronic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006820 @@@HA@@@) to fabricate the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@/ZIF-8@HA nanoplatform.

citations.NLM: Obaid EAMS, Wu S, Zhong Y, Yan M, Zhu L, Li B, Wang Y, Wu W, Wang G. pH-Responsive hyaluronic acid-enveloped ZIF-8 nanoparticles for anti-atherosclerosis therapy. Biomater Sci. 2022 Aug 24;10(17):4837-4847. PMID: 35858474

results.title: Main differences between two highly effective lipid-lowering therapies in subclasses of lipoproteins in patients with acute myocardial infarction
results.text_hl: Higher effectiveness in the clearance of @<m>DISEASE_Atherosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherogenic IDL@@@ particles was also observed following @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ therapy compared with @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ monotherapy

results.title: A self-driven bioinspired nanovehicle by leukocyte membrane-hitchhiking for early detection and treatment of atherosclerosis.
results.text_hl: Upon sequentially embedding an anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@ST@@@) and decorating a targetable @GENE_APOA1 @GENE_335 @@@apolipoprotein A-I@@@ mimetic 4F peptide (AP), the as-fabricated MNC@M@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@-ST@@@/AP exhibits excellent anti-@<m>DISEASE_Atherosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerotic@@@ effects by alleviating @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and oxidative stress as well as promoting @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ efflux via RCT pathways.

results.title: Ethereal Extract of Pepper: Preventing Atherosclerosis and Left Ventricle Remodeling in LDL Receptor Knockout Mice
results.text_hl: After 60 days, treatment with both red pepper ethereal extracts and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ prevented @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Atherosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerotic lesion@@@ progression, and @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricle hypertrophy@@@.
